tooltip.block.partnership.boatyard:
Required to manufacture, improve or repair boats.
Also allows the production of other resources and tools needed for the sea.
tooltip.block.partnership.buoy: Used to mark borders or highlights on water.
tooltip.block.partnership.chain_buoy: Used to make the borders between Buoys on water.
tooltip.block.partnership.anchor: Ideal for docks to secure boats.
tooltip.block.partnership.marine_cannon:
Can be configured and fired from a given angle. Sinks ships immediately when hit.
Must be loaded with a Cannonball and up to three Gunpowder and then started with a redstone signal.
tooltip.item.partnership.kayak: Slightly larger than a normal boat, but it has room for up to three passengers.
tooltip.item.partnership.lifebuoy: Throw this to whoever needs it! Can only hold one passenger and is being mainly controlled with the mouse.
tooltip.item.partnership.sailboat: Faster than a normal boat because of its sail.
menu.partnership.marine_cannon.rotate: Click and drag to rotate the cannon
command.partnership.feedback.error.playe: Only players can use this command.
command.partnership.feedback.dockableChu: Chunk %s is not being marked as dock.
Chunk %s has one anchor marking it as an dock.
Chunk %s has %s anchors marking it as an dock.
